title: Blue Seed 1.5
synopsis: This is a re-telling of the first series. one episode is seen through the view of Momiji, the other is seen through the view of Kusunagi.
characters: ['Kusanagi, Mamoru', 'Fujimiya, Momiji', 'Sawaguchi, Koume', 'Takeuchi, Ryoko', 'Kunikida, Daitetsu', 'Yamazaki, Sakura', 'Matsudaira, Azusa', 'Sugishita, Shunichi', 'Yaegashi, Yoshiki', 'Yagami, Murakumo']
